gm_see_players.Name: See Player Roll Icons?
gm_see_players.Hint: If enabled, the GM will see icons beside all player names that they can use to access that player's roll stats.

roll_storage.Name: Max rolls stored
roll_storage.Hint: How many rolls should the system store before older rolls begin to be overwritten?

players_see_players.Name: Can Players Access Tracked Rolls?
players_see_players.Hint: If disabled, players will not be able to access their roll summaries.

count_hidden.Name: Count Blind Rolls?
count_hidden.Hint: If disabled, blind rolls for players will not be counted in the tracker.

clear_rolls.title: Clear Rolls?
clear_rolls.content: Are you sure you want to clear your rolls? This cannot be undone.
